::Information::


Released : March 21, 2014
Genre: Action / Slasher
Developer: Spark Unlimited / Team Ninja and Comcept
Publisher: Tecmo Koei
Platform: PC
Publication Type: License [Steam-Rip]
Language: English
Language: English
Tablet: Present ( Deadmau5 ) 


::Description::


Yaiba is part of an offshoot of the main line of the narrative Ninja Gaiden. 
The main character is Yaiba, a ninja who fell at the hands of Ryu Hayabusa, 
the main character of the series. Usva river could be the burial place of 
great zombie with which, according to the plot of the game to fight.


::System Requirements::


OS: Windows XP (32-bit / 64-bit) 
Processor: Dual core CPU 2.5 GHz 
Memory: 3 GB RAM 
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9800 or better 
Hard Drive: 7 GB available space 
Sound Card: Standard audio device


::Installation Steps::


1) Installed by running setup.exe.

2) Copy the No-DVD Content in the main game directory.

3) Play.


::Notes::


Before Installing and downloading the torrent and game please turn off 

antivirus or disable it as sometimes false positive appears and many users 

think its a freakin virus.
